IUserComponent - Interface in vidis.data.mod
basic module component interface that all user implemented modules must implement
IUserLink - Interface in vidis.data.mod
this interface defines a basic functionality for all user module links; anyway for implementation of a new link in a ne module, the class AUserLink should be used instead.
IUserNode - Interface in vidis.data.mod
the interface for a module node; please keep in mind that you should use the abstract class AUserNode to implement new modules. there we implemented basic functionality in order to let the simulator work flawlessly together with the module.
IUserPacket - Interface in vidis.data.mod
the interface for a packet in a user implemented module. just like links and nodes you should NOT use this interface to implement a new module, but use the abstract AUserPacket class instead as there we implemented already a lot of basic and vital functionality for the simulator!
IVariableChangeListener - Interface in vidis.data.var
the Variable Change Listener Interface
IVariableChangeProducer - Interface in vidis.data.var
This interface defines all methods used for handling our variable system
IVariableContainer - Interface in vidis.data.var
This interface defines all methods used for handling our variable system
